titleStmt.title: An act for settling the militia for the City of London, and liberties thereof. Monday, March 12. 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this act be forthwith printed and published. Thomas St. Nicholas, clerk of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Streater, and John Macock, printers to the Parliament,

notesStmt.note: Title ornament; some text in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
